1.content:
One glorious day a teenage boy named Bill Grant was on his way to school. He was a very average guy with dark brown hair and a fairly slim body type that was neither especially ugly or impressive. He hardworking father, a kind, caring though sometimes overbearing mother and annoying. In terms of schools he was doing alright in school, he wasn't failing in any of his class but he wasn’t excelling in anything either.


Overall Bill had a very quiet calm, nice and uneventful life but that was about to change.


While walking down the street Bill spotted a small shiny stone lying in the grass next to the pavement. He didn’t know what complied to do so but, the moment he saw it, he walked over and picked. He turned around and discovered that on other side was an inscription on the other side, “Those who make a wish in angry while holding this stone shall have it granted.”


Bill raised an eyebrow, was that true could rock really grant wish? He smiled, of course not? This was obviously some kind of joke. But he did have to give credit where it was due, whoever had set this prank up, they were at least trying to be creative. Regardless it might be good for a laugh at so he pocketed the stone and carried onto school, he got as far end of the front lawn when suddenly…...

11.content:
Bill found his best friend Matt Reed standing there right outside the gate to his house, just like he had done every day since they started high school. Matt was the same age as Bill had blonde hair and was bit more muscle than Bill.

“Hey, buddy!” Bill waved.

“Hello,” Matt said glumly. That was strange normally Matt was a pretty upbeat guy.

“Is something wrong?”

“Yes Bill, me and Gloria had another breakup.” Matt and his once again off again girlfriend, seemed to be trapped in a cycle of Matt doing something wrong, Gloria getting angry often to an unreasonable degree, they would break up and after a while got back together. To be honest it could get quite annoying at times. Once Matt finished his rant Bill decide that perhaps have a little laugh would cheer his friend up.


“Hey Matt, check this out I found this green stone in the garden,” Bill showed the ‘wishing stone’ to Matt, he took the rock and turned in over in his hand. “Apparently if you get angry enough it will grant you wishes.”

The two friends chuckled at how dumb the whole idea of magic rock was. The moment passed and Matt’s mood became sour again, “You know what I wish that…..”

1121.content:
For a few seconds Bill’s vision was too blurred to see, when it cleared up Matt was on longer occupying the space he had been standing, instead of him was a confused adult woman in her late twenties. Her hair was a long mane shiny of golden locks, her eyes were bright violet, her teeth were perfectly white, her lips were of a good quality and she had a button nose. She was also pretty tall with long fine but muscle legs and her delicate soft hands ended with long blue painted manicured nails and very big chest. She wore a long gold chain necklace that seemed to have been placed there to emphasise her large set of asset, while her earlobes were pierced by a set of silver earrings. Her last accessory was a small navy blue purses that hung over her left shoulder.

As for clothing, her main piece was a professional navy blue blazer jacket with golden buttons, underneath the a was a light grey blouse, the blouse was a navy blue pencil skirt. Meanwhile, her long elegant legs were wrapped in pantyhose. Finally, she wore a pair of light blue high heels.

The overall impression, she was a strong professional who took great pride in her skill and appearance, that she was someone who should always be taken seriously, the only thing that didn’t fit with picture was her confused and dizzy expression.

“What happened?” The woman asked her voice remind Bill of his mother's.

“Hey Bill, why are you staring at me like that and did you shrink, why do I feel so strange?”

Suddenly a theory, to the woman’s identity popped into Bill’s head. “Matt is that you?”

The woman gave Bill an annoyed look, “Of course it's me, stupid!?”

“Um...Matt looks down,” The women looked down as Bill instructed, only then did notice her large pair of breast. The woman cheeks turned red with panic, “holy…” she stopped talking and covered her mouth only just realising that something was wrong with it.

Their only logical explanation was either this was some sort of elaborate prank, or the rock had transformed Matt into a woman.

“I’m a woman! How the hell did this happen!” The woman who was probably Matt began to devolve into a panic that would be comical if the reason behind it wasn’t so terrifying. "My hair is my eyes and these shoes, how does in one walk in them!” Matt then stumbles slight, before grabbing her hair.

“How do we fix this?” Matt moaned, while Bill looked on trying desperately create a plan of action.
1121.title: Matt is now Molly

11213.content:
Matt and Bill were so busy just trying process what happened that they both failed to notice that someone was turning around the corner. That someone immediately bumped into Matt, who was not uses to her new center of gravity or the heels that she was now wearing, wobbled for a few seconds before completely losing her balance and toppling over, the green stone falling from her hand.

Bill shut his eye dreading the inevitable sound of friend falling over and been hurt, that never happened. Bill opened his eyes to see that a man had caught Matt stopped her from falling over, he was wearing grey business suit hand dark down hair and green eyes.

“Sorry, I didn’t see you there,” the man said.

Matt looked up at the man and suddenly her cheeks turned red “No I shouldn't have been standing there...” Matt said. For a moment the two stared into each other's eyes in almost dream like state that lasts for about five seconds, before the man broke it by letting go of Matt. The boy turned woman stumbled a bit but this time regained her balance, her cheeks still red and a smile on her.

The man bent down picked up the stone and gave it back to Matt, “My apologies, for making drop your stone, it would be a shame if you lost it since it goes so well with your beautiful eyes.”

Matt smile grew as her pretty violet eyes gained a more flirtatious quality, “Thank you, you know quite the handsome one, Mr….”

“Andrew Stallan, please call me Andrew,” the man insisted,

“Andrew Stallan,” Matt seemed to be savouring the name, “That is a wonderful name.”

“I’m sure your name is just as wonderful, Miss…

“Ma….” The blond stopped and hesitated, “My name is Molly, Molly Reed,” Molly said as she smiled and played with her hair.
That was it! Bill couldn’t stand here, this was getting too damn creepy, he need change Molly back to normal now! He marched up to Molly, intending to grab the stone from her…..

112132.content:
Bill careful began to approach, while Molly was still distracted by her flirting with Andrew. His hands were only inches away from the stone when suddenly Molly locked his arm into a tight painful grip.

“Excuse me Andrew, but my nephew and I need to have a chat,” Molly put a lot of aggression on the word chat. She tightened her grip and pulled Bill into a nearby alleyway, before letting ago and shoving him forward.

“Ow, Matt why did you….”

“Be quiet!” Molly’s demand, as her eyes became forestry cold with a glare that pierced Bill’s soul. Everything about the way Molly acted was completely different before she had felt like a boy trapped in the body of a woman. But now the way she placed her hand her hip, the fact she could now stand and walk in heels with little effort, the powerful aura of confidence and the frightening look that scared Bill far more than his own mother could everything about her suggested a capable woman who took crap from no one.


“Now listen here, I’m just trying to enjoy myself, so what gives you the right to come along and ruin it!”

Billy tried to form words but he was terrified by Molly’s cold demanding voice he was unable to even make so much as a sound.

Molly continued, “You know what Bill!” She yelled as green stone in her hand glowed bright green, “I wish…”

That was then an idea popped into Bill's headed it was a long shot but if Matt's phone survived, the guy's transformation into Molly, Bill could just call her using his mobile.

Bill quickly pulled his phone from one of his pockets and began pressing buttons with as much speed his fingers could muster. He felt an overwhelming pressure as the phone began to ring, after a few agonizing seconds someone answered.

"Molly Reed speaking, who are you?" The sound of Molly's voice on the other end brought a hint of refile and a lot of dread.

"Matt it is Billl I need to talk to you."

"My name is Molly," the woman responded with an icy cold angry that made the hair on the back on Bill's neck, but he didn't back down.

"Your name is Matt and I need to get you back to normal!"

"By normal you mean a shallow pathetic teenage boy, who can't even keep a middle school relationship without ruining it," Molly spoke about her form self with disgust, "Listen right now I'm beautiful woman with successful job as head of marketing at one biggest fashion company, I have a wonderful apartment in the best part of town and have just entered a relationship with a wonderful man, this new life of mine is great and I will not let you or any one else ruin it!"

"What I suppose to tell your parents that their son was turned adult woman by magic rock and now wants nothing to do with them!" Bill yelled.

"I think they would be happy for me," Molly responded coolly, "Now since your so obsessed with 'trying to help me' I think I should give you a reward for being persistent." Suddenly took on a playful yet sinister quality, which suddenly remember that Molly still had the magic rock.

Before Bill could voice any protest, Molly made her wish.

“I think you would make a great addition to our team! We have an opening for a new bikini and lingerie model that I would love for you to fill!” Molly said over the voice with a sinister laugh.

Bill began to panic as he felt a sudden surge of energy rush through him. Looking down to his hands he saw his finger nails were growing longer.

Looking at himself in the mirror Bill saw the changes were already rapidly underway.

His hair was growing rapidly as it became lucious and full cascading down his shoulders until his dark brown locks fell right above his butt.

He lost all his body hair as his fingernails grew out longer with nice French tipped manicures.

112132221.content:
The moment Molly spoke those the stone unleashed a blinding flash of light and Bill found that he was no longer a teenage boy, but an eight-girl with long blond hair and green eyes, who was also wearing a sky blue skirt and a kitty themed shirt.

The new girl looked at her new attire with shock and horror, "Matt what did you...." Her mouth was suddenly forced shut as her eyes went blank.

A second the life returned to her eyes and she looked at the ground in shame, "I'm sorry aunt Molly, I just wanted to see your pretty rock."


Molly's eyes soften as her lips formed a genital motherly smile, "Honestly Brittany, if you want to look at my gemstone, you should have just asked."

Molly offered the gemstone to Brittany, who eagerly reached forward to grab the stone, Molly raised her hand, and Brittany stopped. "Just promise me that for now on you will ask if you want something instead just taking it."

Brittany nodded firmly, and Molly let her nice take the stone casing the young girl's eyes to brighten up.

With the issue revolved the pair left the ally to where Andrew was waiting, "Sorry about Andrew, would it be alright met up for a cup of coffee, later?"

Andrew smiled playfully, "Of course, meet you at the shop coffee for lunch for two?"


"Glad," Molly smiled while winking.

Brittany rolled her eyes as the adults fluttered, soon Andrew said his goodbyes and Molly was leading Brittany into her fancy new car. Then it was off to school, while Brittany stared at her beautiful green stone.

Bill laughed at the wish as he suddenly noticed the glowing stone. "Hey why is the stone glow...." Bill said as he was suddenly interrupted by a bright flash of light coming from the stone.

"Whoa what was that?" Matt asked as he rubbed his eyes from the flash.

"I don't know I just......." Bill said as he suddenly paused. A strange tingling sensation was building up in his body, it was spreading rapidly all over as a sudden intense wave of heat hit his body causing him to hung over and fall to his knees.

"Dude! What's wrong?!" Matt called out.

"Something is.....happening to my body!" Bill cried out as he felt his insides churning.

It only took a moment for them to realize what was happening. Bills hair was growing rapidly as his brown hair cascaded down past his ears and shoulders. His nails were also growing longer. His whole body began to get smalller and thinner as he shrunk from six feet tall to just around 5'5.

Bill cried out moaning for help as Matt struggled to do anything but just watch. He was helpless to do anything at the moment.

Bills while bidy frame began to change as his hips expanded and got wider. His legs shrunk down as his body hair began to vanish. His stomach pulled in tighter and flatter. 12.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

"William!" snapped a stern female voice.

Bill gulped and looked up: there stood his mom, looking pretty pissed off ... and holding the Grellstone in her palm!

"This is the third time this week I've had to come after you!" she scolded. "I swear, you are so irresponsible. When are you going to grow up, mister?"

She handed him a backpack. Crap, thought Bill. I can't believe I forgot that.

"I can't believe you forgot again," Mom scolded. "Your homework, your lunch, all your school stuff is in here. And what's more, you left the house without doing your chores ... AGAIN! Why is it I never have to remind your sister. Kimberly is three years younger than you, and yet she seems so much more mature. You didn't put out the cat this morning, you didn't feed the dog, and you didn't take out the garbage. On top of that, your room is unholy mess! What's your excuse, mister?"

"Ummm," Bill gulped again and knew nothing he said would satisfy mom at this point.

"You make things so frustrating sometimes," said Mom angrily. "Sometimes I wish..."

What does Mom wish for?

"You make things so frustrating sometimes," said Mom angrily. "Sometimes I wish you could see and hear yourself!"

Suddenly, the whole world swirled around Bill's eyes and he found his perspective had changed. He was ... He was now looking at himself?!

He was a lot taller, but differently balanced, and standing in front of his own body? ...What th--?!

Bill looked down and recognized he was now wearing his mom's clothes: He now wore a v-cut yellow sweater that tightly hugged a pair of heavy, round, middle aged breasts. He had on black, women's dress slacks and a pair of low heeled business-casual women's shoes. He held his hands up in front of his face in amazement: his fingers were long, slender, and the nails were painted a shiny, dark burgundy. He was even wearing his mom's wedding ring now.

He felt his mother's long, wavy dark hair around his shoulders and could tell he was wearing a pair of her dangling earrings too.

Bill's old body looked up at him and said ...

1211.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

Bill's old body looked up at him and said, “Mom? What's wrong?”

“I... er... that is... well...” stammered Bill, confused and nervous about hearing his own mother's voice come out of his lips as he talked.

Bill's old body continued to frown at him, a perplexed expression on his own face. Apparently his mom was now in his body and actually believed she was her own son!

“I'm just worried you're going to be late for school,” Bill finally told his old body. “Come along and get going... uh... young man. I don't want you to miss school.”

Bill watched as his “son” quickly gathered up his things and trudged off down the sidewalk.

“Bye mom!” called out his old body.

“Bye... erm... Bill! Have a good day... uh... sweetie!”

Bill wiped nervous sweat from his forehead. Sighing heavily, he dropped to the pavement and sat there on the sidewalk trying to collect his thoughts. He was a grown woman. He stared for a moment at the heavy, round breasts bulging out from his sweater. His entire body felt strangely proportioned and out-of-balance now.

“This is so weird,” he sighed. “I'm mom and she's me... but she thinks she really IS me. What am I supposed to do now?”

What next?

12112.content:
(Originally Written by hilterskilter)

Maybe I should make a wish on the Grellstone... Bill thought, and immediately discarded the option. Much as he wanted to, he could only make a wish while angry, and right now he felt more confused and unsettled than agitated in any sense of the word. With no other choices, and dreading the idea of attending Mom's work on her behalf, he settled with going back home and figuring things out from there.

Ten minutes later, Bill walked through his front door. He realized this was the second or third time in his high school career that he had walked inside his house at seven forty-five, when he'd usually be sitting with Matt and his girlfriend Gloria, waiting for the first period bell to ring and talking about their plans for winter break. Putting food for the dog and letting out the cat--just as Mom wanted--he walked into the kitchen and mustered up the courage to call her work, finding the number within a binder she had placed on the table. Lying was easier than he had expected. Mom had a good record for attending work, but not good enough that they questioned any absence. Once he hung up, Bill walked up to his bedroom, placed the Grellstone on his desk, and fell onto the mattress, face-first.

It stung his new breasts, unsurprisingly, and his feet extended several inches off the side of his bed for a change. Still, Bill felt more calm than he did at any other point in that morning, lying there. It was kind of nice to skip school and do nothing for a day. While Kimberly and Mom, in his body, were at school, and Dad was at work, he could go downstairs and play video games. The novelty of doing it while in his mother's body was not lost on Bill, and for a second he entertained a slightly dirty thought of doing it in her underwear. He did not think of playing with her body in any capacity, however. Even with every part of her body under his control, she still remained his mom.

Bill had just begun to get cozy with this plan when, interrupting his reverie, the doorbell rang.

"Who could that be?" Bill grumbled, mustering the willpower to go downstairs and checked. Opening the front door, he found it was...
12112.title: Back at home

choices: People at school see Bill as his mom.

People at school see Bill's mom's body, but think it's normal for him.
1213.content:
(Originally Written by EmmaZool)

“Well?” asked Bill's old body impatiently. “If you have nothing to say for yourself, then get going young man. I don't want you to be late for school again!”

“But Mom,” said Bill, clearly confused. “Just look at me! I'm you. And you're me.”

“What are you talking about?” Bill's body scolded him. “I don't have time for this nonsense. You look fine. And you look like you, a regular teenage boy who doesn't show much respect for his elders. Now quite fooling around and get to school. I mean it, young man. NOW!”

Bill was too bewildered by the sight of his own body scolding him to laugh. Otherwise the sight of a 16 year old boy lecturing a grown woman would have been hysterical.

“Okay mom,” he said, still confused about the whole affair. “If you want me to go to school like this, I guess I will.”

“We'll discuss this later,” she said. “I'm late for work.”

And with that, she took off. Bill wondered what his mother's co-workers would think when she showed up in her son's body but still insisting everything was normal. Or would they all see her as herself? For that matter, what will Bill's own friends and teachers at school see?

Something odd happens to draw attention to Bill's invisible transformation.
12132.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

Arriving at school, Bill nervously walked into the building. He was still in his mother's mother, wearing all her clothes. But for some reason she didn't seem to notice.

“Hi, Bill!” called a voice.

Bill turned and recognized his best friend Matt.

“Uh, hi Matt,” he said, nervous about the way he looked and the fact he now had his mother's voice.

“Almost late again buddy?” Matt laughed, punching Bill in the arm.

“Yeah, guess so...” Bill murmured.

“What's wrong?” asked Matt.

“Oh, I just... I guess I'm not feeling myself today,” Bill stammered. “Matt, let me ask you a question and please answer honestly. Do I seem... different at all to you? I mean do I look or sound weird? Am I dressed normal and stuff?”

“Dude, you look fine!” laughed Matt.

“Is this... is this how I always look and dress?” asked Bill.

“Sheesh, what's with you today?” said Matt. “Yes, for the last time. You look completely normal. And those are totally your normal clothes you're wearing Bill. Are you sick or something?”

“Nahh, I'm fine,” said Bill trying to laugh it all off. “Just goofing off.”

“Well c'mon, before we're late for class!” said Matt.

Just then a bell rang and kids started migrating out of the school hallways and into the classrooms.

Bill looked down at himself as he walked – he still wore his mother's sweater, dress slacks, and heels. His fingernails were long and neatly painted. He wore his mother's wedding ring and could feel earrings dangling from his earlobes. Yet, somehow the Grellstone had made all these things invisible to the rest of the world.

Bill wandered into his first class and took his seat, feeling intensely out of place.

What next?
12132.title: People at school see Bill as Bill.

choices: "Gee ... I never thought about it before. I guess it really is kinda weird."
"You were born with a strange condition. You've just always been this way."
12133.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

Bill arrived at school, feeling very much self-conscious and out-of-place wandering around in his own mother's body.

“Hi, Bill!” cried out a voice from down the crowded school corridor.

Bill squinted and recognized his best friend Matt approaching.

“Oh... uh... hi Matt!” Bill nervously replied with his mother's voice.

“Almost late again buddy?” Matt laughed, playfully smacking Bill in the arm.

“Yeah... oh... I... um guess so...” Bill stuttered.

“What's wrong?” asked Matt.

“Oh, I just... I guess I'm not feeling myself today,” Bill mumbled. “Say Matt, let me ask you a question and please be honest with me. Do I seem... y'know... different at all to you? I mean do I look or sound weird? Am I dressed normal and stuff?”

“Get out of here!” Matt laughed.

“I'm serious!” Bill persisted.

“Dude, you look totally normal,” said Matt. “And your outfit is fine. Just like you always wear. Nice heels, by the way.”

“I always wear this?!” asked Bill, gesturing down at the sweater, dress slacks, and low-heeled women's dress shoes he wore.

“Well, stuff like that. Yeah,” said Matt. “My mom is pretty jealous of your wardrobe. But, so what?”

“Well... but... these are women's clothes!” said Bill. “Do you think I'm a woman?!”

“What? No!” laughed Matt. “Dude, what's with you today?”

“Tell me, Matt!” pleaded Bill. “This is so weird. Just humor me and tell me who I am.”

“Jesus, what's going on with you?” frowned a concerned Matt. “Do you need to see the school nurse?”

“Just tell me!” hissed Bill.

“Fine, fine,” relented Matt. “You're my best friend, Bill. You're a guy. You're sixteen, go to school here, and...”

“Why do I have boobs?” cried Bill, gesturing at the swollen mounds protruding from his yellow v-neck sweater. “Why am I wearing high heels... and lipstick... and earrings? Why do I look liked a middle-aged woman if I'm really a sixteen year old guy?!”

What does Matt say?

"Actually, what's so frustrating," Bill suddenly barked back at his mom, in a scolding tone of voice. "Is that you are so irresponsible and didn't give me this backpack earlier, young lady. And realistically, it's your fault that I haven't been properly taught any responsibility up to this point. You heard me! Young lady, you have been quite a disappointment and it's high time you shape up and start setting a better example for my sister and I."

Bill's mom hung her head shamefully.

"Ummm, I'm like sorry and stuff," she said, unable to look her son in the eye. "I'll do better..."

"You just see to it that you do a better job in the future," said Bill, wagging a finger in his mother's face. "Now let's get going. We can't be late."

What next?
123.title: I wish you acted more like me.

choices: I wish you were some really hot chick.
I wish you were some ugly, dumb fat chick.
I wish you were my mom.
I wish you were a chicken.
Something Else...
14.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

Bill scrambled to his feet, frantically searching for the Grellstone. Oh, no! There, in front of him, stood Rob Bolstrum -- a bully with a head full of rocks, but a year older and a lot taller and bigger than Bill.

"Oooooooo, a magic wishing stone?" laughed Rob.

Crap, thought Bill. He must've overheard everything.

"What a load," said Rob, pushing Bill to the sidewalk with one hand. His second hand still held the emerald Grellstone. "Maybe we should test out this thing. Only works when you're angry, huh? Good thing I'm always so happily pissed-off at the whole world, huh pipsqueak? Anger is practically my middle name. So let's try this thing out."

Rob kicked Bill in the gut. Bill collapsed to the sidewalk, clutching his side. Above him, Rob laughed.

"Lessee," said Rob with an angry scowl on his face. "What's a real good way to test this thing? You can be my guinea pig, Bill. I wish ..."

What does Rob wish for?
14.title: Rob the school bully was there waiting for Bill

choices: Bill grabs the Grellstone from Rob and makes his own wish.
Rob wishes Bill into being his slutty, bimbo girlfriend.
Rob wishes for something else.
141.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

"I wish you were some really hot chick!" shouts Rob.

Bill looked down and gasped as his body rapidly melted and re-shaped itself into the form of a petite, big breasted blonde. He was now dressed in a tiny white mini-skirt that barely came to mid-thigh. He wore strappy, high-heeled silver sandals. His mammoth new breasts were barely constrained behind a thin, pastel blue tank top with spaghetti straps. It was clear from the visible protruding nipples pushing against the shirt's almost translucent fabric that he did not wear a bra.

Rob laughed hysterically as Bill brushed aside a strand of long, golden blonde hair.

"Ohmigod!" Bill squeaked in a giggling, high-pitched, girlish voice. "I... I... I'm a girl!"

What next?
141.title: I wish you were some really hot chick.

choices: Revenge calmed Bill down, he's not angry enough to use the stone
Bill changes back to normal
Other
1411.content:
(Originally Written by Clagger)

Rob was getting a kick out of Bill's situation. So much so that he didn't even notice when Bill jumped at him and grabbed the stone.

"Hey, give me that back!" Rob yelled.

Fortunately Bill saw this coming and was already a ways ahead of the lumbering bully by the time he started running. However, Bill's foot ware was not making running easy. Nor was the weight of his breasts swinging back and forth on his chest.

"I can't keep this up!" Shrieked Bill.

"I wish I was back to normal!"

Nothing happened.

"What? I wish I was a boy!"

Bill looked down at the stone in his hand as his legs slowed. It didn't seem like it was going to do much of anything.

"Got you!"

Rob came from behind and wrapped his arms around Bill, restraining him, as well as feeling up his new body. Bill just went limp in his arms, until he suddenly tightened his fists and pulled up his dangling legs a bit. He no longer felt scared or panicked, but angry, very angry. I wasn't just because he had been turned into a girl, or that Rob was now using him for his enjoyment, but because he was now just fed up with Rob altogether. All the years of frustration with him just came bubbling up to surface at once.

"I'm so sick of you! You disgust me. Why don't you just turn into the one who's always picked on!"

With that Rob let go of Bill and began to stumble back.

"What's happening?"

Rob began to lose a few inches of height and quite a bit of bulk. His face became a lot thinner and girlier, and his hair quickly tripled in length. His body was now only half of its previous size and becoming more feminine, but only slightly. His hips puffed out a tiny bit, as did his chest, but it was barely noticeable. All of a sudden he put his hands to his mouth and winced in pain, when he pulled them away, Bill saw some braces on his teeth. Finally his clothes changed to some rather loose fitting girly clothes.

"Huh?"

Robbed squeaked in a tone much girlier than Bill's, in fact he sounded a bit like a child.

Bill smirked, still gripping the stone tightly. "Finally! Big Rob is reduced to what he really is! A wimp."

Rob stopped staring as his body and gave Bill an angry glance.

"Just wait until I get that stone you freak! You're going to beg me to be begging me just to be..."

Bill cut him off.

"The stone? You're not going to use it ever again. You need a personality to match your wimpy body. Instead of getting mad at everything, you're just going to run away crying."

Rob get even madder. "What?" He was charged Bill and went for the stone, but received a smack across the face instead which sent him to the ground.

"You, you..."

Rob kept scowling, but couldn't seem to finish his sentence of get up. After a few seconds, a tear came streaming down his face. Bill just burst out in laughter.

Rob just sat on the ground fighting the urge to cry, but it wouldn't last much longer. From around the corner came a few girl's from Bill's school. The giggled to each other as they saw Rob sitting on the floor.

"Look who it is Sandy, Roberta the washboard!" said one of the girls, pointing at Rob's flat chest.

"I didn't know they made training bras for sixteen year olds!" Said another girl, which made all three break out in laughter.

Rob, or Roberta, couldn't take anymore after that. He burst out in tears screaming before getting up and running as fast as he could.

Bill looked on as he ran. "That should teach him."

142.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

"I wish you were some ugly, dumb fat chick!" shouts Rob.

In an instant, Bill's body had started to morph: each of his limbs puffed up, his torso swelled, and he could feel himself growing shorter but significantly heavier. At the same time, he felt his breasts swelling up to a seemingly impossible state of monstrously massive melons. Bill watched as his clothing suddenly changed shape as well: his jeans became purple sweatpants, his shirt became a pink and white striped blouse, and he could feel heavy bra straps cutting into his shoulders now to support the newly swollen boulders on his chest. Simultaneously, Bill felt his thought process become considerably cloudier. It hurt to think, and he now found himself feeling rather dull and vacant.

Rob laughed hysterically at the short, pig-faced, frizzy haired, pimply girl now standing in Bill's place.

"What happened to me?" Bill asked in a high-pitched but dull monotone.

"Nothing, lard-ass!" laughed Rob. "You've always been like that!"

"Yeah," mumbled Bill, looking down with vacant eyes at his new body. "I guess I always have been."

What next?

143.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

"Lessee," said Rob. "What's a good way to test this thing? I wish you were my mom."

"Wait!" cried Bill, but it was too late. The world swam dizzily in front of Bill's face ... he blinked twice ... and then looked down at himself.

Bill was now a bleached blonde, middle aged trailer trash woman, past her prime but still dressed as a tramp in a vain attempt to recapture her youth. Big hoop earrings hung from his ears. He wore a hot pink tube top, several sizes too small. A faded rose tattoo appeared above his huge, but slightly sagging left breast. He wore skin tight jeans that allowed a slight muffin top to appear over his plump, heavy, new "mom ass." He could feel a lacy thong riding up beneath. He had on a pair of spiky black heels. Several cheap bracelets dangled about his wrists, and his long, bright red fingertips held a lit cigarette in one hand and a half-empty can of cheap beer in the other.

Rob laughed hysterically at the sudden appearance of his mom.

What next?
143.title: I wish you were my mom.

A cleaning woman.
A cheap hooker.
1433.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

“Change me back!” Bill screeched, horrified at his new appearance.

“Shut up and let me think!” snapped Rob. “So this crazy jewel really works.”

“Yes, and you can keep it if you'll just change me back,” pleaded Bill.

“Hey, stupid!” Rob yelled. “I get to keep it no matter what you say. You're in no position to tell me what to do. Now shut up before I wish you into something worse.”

“Worse?!” shrieked Bill, looking down at his chubby, over-the-hill female body. “What could possibly be worse than getting trapped in the body of your mother!”

“You talking trash about my mom?” growled Rob in a suddenly dark tone of voice.

“Hey, you changed me into her!” yelled Bill.

“And I'll change you into something ten times worse now!” yelled Rob.

What does Rob wish Bill into now?
1433.title: What Could Be Worse?

choices: Bill leaves to give Rob a chance to cool off.
Bill stays and begs Rob to change him back.
14331.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

Bill gulped fearfully and took a nervous step back from the infuriated Rob.

“Look, I-I-I-I'm sorry...” Bill stuttered.

“Too late,” frowned Rob with a red-faced scowl on his face. “I wish... I wish you were my skanky older sister Vicky!”

The Grellstone flared into a brilliant, radiant flash of blinding emerald light.

Bill had to blink three or four times to regain his vision. But even before he looked down, he could already feel his body had changed, becoming shorter and considerably lighter.

When Bill looked down, he discovered he now had enormous breasts practically popping out from a far-too-tight, black shirt that was cut deeply low into his now bountiful cleavage. The tight, lacy black bra that barely constrained them was exposed in several places. He was wearing an extremely short, denim mini-skirt that mere inches below his crotch and tightly tugged his thighs together. He could feel beneath that he wore thong panties he suspected were at least a size too small for this body. He wore knee-high, black leather boots that sported two-inch heels. He could see his fingernails were long and painted a bright, glossy shade of red.

“Rob, please change me back,” Bill pleaded, instantly disgusted with the high-pitched, whiny, nasally 'girly' voice he now had.

“Screw you!” snapped Rob. “Now get the hell out of here... or I'll give you Vicky's personality too, and you can spend your days as a brain-dead bimbo spreading your legs for every guy that crosses your path!”

What next?
14331.title: Rob's skanky sister.

choices: I wish those cheerleaders thought you were Amber.
I wish you were one of those little kids on the sidewalk.
Another wish
145.content:
(Originally Written by Sandyseeker)

Rob stands there grasping the Grellstone, still towering over Bill. The bully seemed uncertain what to say as a test wish. He glanced around the neighborhood with a cruel eye.

Across the street, a couple high school cheerleaders were sitting in a parked car. One of them honked the horn and yelled, "Hurry up, Amber! We're gonna be late."

Nearby on the sidewalk, a group of giggling grade school girls in uniforms walked along laughing and chattering amongst themselves.

And just down the block, a pair of conservatively dressed religious missionaries -- one male and one female -- was knocking on doors and handing out pamphlets.

"I got it!" said Rob with an angry smile. "I wish ..."

What does Rob wish for?
145.title: Something Else...

info.brief_description: An unofficial remake. A magic rock furled by anger will grant wish to one who holds it.
